attributes.action: Give Radiographers an immediate payrise above the so called rate of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That if this is not implemented all NHS staff should consider strike action.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Radiographers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
